div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1520 Galilee, near Tarchiha, c. 20 km. NW of anc. Ace, 1964 Burial: c. 300 B.C. Contents: 40+ AR Alexander III: 35 lifetime and early post. tetradr. (Amphipolis 1, Side 1, Citium 2, Salamis 1, Sidon 1, Tyre 3, Ace 25, Babylon 1) Disposition: private coll., Israel, some Spaer, INJ 1965-6, pp. 1-7, illus. (no. 35 = Salamis, Newell, Demetrius, p. 19, no. 2)
